'''Grainfruit Wrap''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Grainfruit Wrap is obtainable from a [[Chest]] in an enemy encampment north-west of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in the [["Masters of the Night-Wind"]], [[Natlan]].

Depending on the quality, Grainfruit Wrap increases the party's defense by '''88'''/'''107'''/'''126''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* This dish is likely inspired by Mesoamerican {{w|tamales}},  and Latin American ''[https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Envuelto Envueltos].'' The word ''envuelto'' translates directly to 'wrap,' which is also the name of the dish in the game.
